content: The Toilevator is a product manufactured and distributed by GMS Group Medical Supply, LLC. The company is based in Pennsylvania, USA, and specializes in providing mobility and accessibility products for people with disabilities or limited mobility. The Toilevator is designed to be a cost-effective and easy-to-install solution for individuals who need to raise the height of their toilet to improve accessibility and safety. The device is made of durable materials and is designed to work with most standard toilets.
